verses.text: Ach in Diosal, tanhwej in wal, anhej t'ayach tzin col in b'a.
Mamin Jehov치, swal t'ayach to Vajal ach. Masanil wach'il ay t'ayin, a t'ayach scoti.
Te wach' yic heb' tzach k'anab'ajan t'a skal heb' a chonhab'. In gana tzin aj t'a skal heb'.
Ol te q'uib'chaanh syaelal heb' sb'atcan t'a spatic junok comon Dios. Max wak'ochlaj in b'a wak'an schiq'uil nok' silab' yet' heb' t'a scomon Dios chi'. Max wal-laj in b'ha t'a sdiosal heb' chi'.
Mamin Jehov치, anhej t'ayach swik' masanil wach'il. Ha achton tzak' masanil tas snib'ej in k'ool. D'a yol a k'ab' ayek' in k 'inal.
Ha wal b'aj ix echtejcan in macb'en, yelxo te wach'. Manhxo jantacoc swach'il tas ix ak'kan chi' t'ayin.
Mamin Jehov치, swal wach' lolonel t'ayach yujto a ach tzak' in raz칩n, tza k'ayb'an pax in pensar t'ak'walil.
Masanil tiempo naan achnhej wuuj. Yujto ayachnhej ek' wed'oc, yuj chi' malaj tas tzin ik'ani.
Yuj chi' ste tzalaj in k'ool tzin b'itani. Malaj tas tzin na'a, yujto tzach wak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Manh ol in actejcanlaj t'a skal heb' chamnac, manh ol a cha k'ab'at in niwanil tik, a in k'anab'ajum in tik t'ayach.
Tzak' wojtaquejel sb'eal k 'inal, tzak'an tzalajb'oc in k'ool ayic ayinek' ed'oc. Aynhej tzalajk'olal t'a a tz'ey t'a masanil k 'inal.
